name: Sasso
description: A calculator-based puzzle game. Eliminate adjacent identical digits. Challenge yourself in Endless mode.

features.title: Digit Elimination
features.description: Create adjacent identical digits to eliminate them. Master arithmetic for chain reactions.

features.title: 3 Game Modes
features.description: Calculator, Practice, and Endless modes. Play at your own pace or face the challenge.

features.title: Score System
features.description: Chain, preparation, and risk multipliers. Aim for the high score.
